title: Drawing, Design for Round Table "A", 1900–05
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: In graphite, at upper left corner of sheet: "_A_"; in graphite, in lower left of sheet, along bottom edge: "]ZV.KS/dba"; stamped in blue ink, in upper right corner: "DEC 11 1905"; in graphite, at upper right of design, with an arrow pointing to table top: numerical notations.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded table top raised on flaring molded rectangular support standing on molded base terminating in four molded and easved winged animal-paw feet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Round Table "A", 1900–05. Graphite on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-114.
